field.output: This program examines all records on the contracts (contracts) database and corrects potential discrepancies occurring in the following date-only field:
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=This program examines all records on the contracts (contracts) database and corrects potential discrepancies occurring in the following date-only field: X=12 Y=2 Height=6 Width=126 ForeColor=0 ArrayLength=1

field.output: The conversion assumes these fields should be exact dates with a time of 00:00. Times 00:00:01 through 11:59:59 are converted to 00:00 of the same day, and times 12:00:00 through 23:59:59 are converted to 00:00 of the next day.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=The conversion assumes these fields should be exact dates with a time of 00:00. Times 00:00:01 through 11:59:59 are converted to 00:00 of the same day, and times 12:00:00 through 23:59:59 are converted to 00:00 of the next day. X=12 Y=26 Height=8 Width=126 ForeColor=0 ArrayLength=4

field.output: Hit the convert PF key to begin the conversion process. You will be given the opportunity to run the conversion now or to abort.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=Hit the convert PF key to begin the conversion process. You will be given the opportunity to run the conversion now or to abort. X=12 Y=36 Height=6 Width=126 ForeColor=0 ArrayLength=3
